note: Human and civil rights policy lawyer, writer, researcher, parent, friend, community and joy addict, ex-journalist, ex-nonprofit exec, ex-filmmaker, ex-musician, forever-Cantabrigian, internationalist from a long line of internationalists, genderqueer, panbifreakwhatever, married to the best person, science lover (but not scientist or follower of scientism), activist, rouser when the rabble needs rousing. Sick of all the bullshit. Tired of being lonely. Here for you if you're good people.
